entry.title: This is Vela
entry.content:
This is Vela

Hi, I’m Vela from Shandong University, majoring in Internet of Things Engineering(IoT Engineering).
Currently I’m interested in Artificial Intelligence, expecially the Deep Learning.
If you want to contact me, just email yf@vela.today.

GitHub Repositories

For all, you can access https://github.com/VelaQ?tab=repositories

I’ve written several Deep-Learning projects, including the following topics:

1. image-restoration(Clickable)

2. isolated-word recognition(Clickable).
